name: smokeping
description: SmokePing is a latency monitoring tool for network links. It runs scheduled pings and visualizes performance and packet loss in RRD graphs via a web interface.
features: Latency monitoring: Measures network latency with continuous ping tests.
Packet loss tracking: Detects and visualizes packet loss over time.
RRD graphs: Displays historical latency data in detailed time-series graphs.
Multiple targets: Monitors multiple hosts or network endpoints simultaneously.
Smoke visualization: Shows latency distribution with unique smoke-like graph rendering.
Alert thresholds: Configures alerts when latency exceeds defined thresholds.
DNS monitoring: Tests DNS resolution times alongside network latency.
Multi-protocol support: Monitors via ICMP, TCP, DNS, and other protocols.
Historical data: Stores years of latency data for long-term trend analysis.
Hierarchical targets: Organizes monitored hosts in tree structure for large networks.
Web interface: Views graphs and statistics through built-in web server.
Custom probes: Extends monitoring with custom probe modules for specific tests.
